item.description:
Please join us for the January 13 Ultra Light Startups event on PR for Startups.

Please note that we do not charge admission for Ultra Light Startups events in Boston but you must reserve an Event Brite ticket at the link below because the venue will reach capacity!

View Full Event Details & Reserve Your Ticket

Startups planning to "Pitch Your Company" should contact me in advance.

PR for Startups


Topics include:
* How to get influential bloggers, reporters and journalists to cover your startup
* Determining which blogs, magazines, newspapers and TV shows to target for your PR efforts
* Developing relationships with journalists
* Best practices on pitching your story
* Handling interviews – how to prepare, what to say, what to avoid
* Maximizing the business value of your press
* And much more…

Moderator BOSTON:
  • Cris De Luca, Ultra Light Startups, Boston


    Moderator NYC:
  • Graham Lawlor, Founder of Ultra Light Startups



      Panelists in NYC (alphabetic order):
    • David Dunne, Founder and CEO of Velocidi PR
      Previously COO of Edelman Digital
    • Stacy Green, Communications Director at Mashable
      Previously with New York Times
    • Nick Saint, Reporter at Silicon Alley Insider
      Previously with Obama for America
    • TJ Walker, CEO of Media Training Worldwide
      Best-selling author and news commentator
item.name: PR for Startups
